actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations governing the humane treatment of animals transported in air commerce.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations governing the humane treatment of animals transported in air commerce.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations governing the humane treatment of animals transported in air commerce.
